Name: Assault Industries Polaris RZR PRO XP High-Clearance 1.5" Forward Offset Boxed A-Arms
Description:
Beef Up Your Pro XP

Your Pro XP is a beefy beast as is, but you could transform it into an absolute monster with Assault Industries' Polaris RZR Pro XP High-Clearance 1.5” Forward Offset Boxed A-Arms. Robust steel construction paired with 1.5” of additional ground clearance will make your suspension nearly bulletproof. With these A-arms, you’ll never have to back down from an obstacle on the trail again.

Fit 33” tires without a lift
Bend design gives 1.5” of additional clearance
Provides a 1.5” forward offset
Durable 1/8” steel plating


33” Tires without a Lift!

With a 1.5” forward offset, you get room for 33” tires without a lift! The offset and the larger tires give your RZR a longer wheelbase, improving stability on rough terrain. There’s not a trail out there that can hold you back with these boxed A-arms.


Bend Design for Additional Ground Clearance

Don’t overlook the advantage that 1.5” of additional ground clearance can give you. These A-arms are designed with clever bends that help you clear the obstacles that used to hold your Pro XP back. You’ll finally have the clearance you need to dominate rocks and logs that used to scrape your undercarriage.


Built for Superior Strength

These Assault Industries A-arms are built with premium 1/8” steel plating for unbeatable toughness. The pivot blocks and sway bar connections are built into the frame and hand-welded for superior performance. No matter what you put them through, these A-arms are built to handle it.


Assault Industries' boxed A-arms are backed by a lifetime warranty, so don’t be afraid to push them to the limit.


Boxed A-Arms Are Badass

Boxed A-arms simply can’t be ignored. The aggressive styling demands attention and screams “strength.” And the Assault Industries logo is laser-cut into a glossy aluminum nameplate and bolted to the frame for true, over-the-top impact. You simply won’t find a better-looking set of A-arms.
Features:
Adds 1.5” of ground clearance
Adds 1.5” forward offset
Made with 1/8” heavy-duty steel plating
Includes high-quality UHMW bushings at no extra cost
Fit up to 33” tires
UV-resistant powder-coat finish
Easy to install
Backed by a lifetime warranty
Fitment:
Polaris RZR PRO XP : 2020+
Polaris RZR PRO XP 4 : 2020+

Name: Honda Pioneer 1000 Atlas Pro 1.5" Forward Offset A-Arms
Description:
Dominate with Atlas Pro A-Arms

There it is—the rough, rocky slope none of your buddies can conquer. Before they know what hit them, they’re eating your dust on your way to the top because you're equipped with SuperATV’s Honda Pioneer 1000 Atlas Pro 1.5" Forward Offset A-Arms. These rugged A-arms provide extra ground clearance, stability, and room for new 31” tires on your Pioneer to help you over boulders that hold stock machines back. With these bad boys, you’ll never back down from a hill again.


Bigger and Stronger Than Stock

Atlas Pro A-arms are an upgrade in every way. They’re 0.5” larger than stock and 0.25” larger than our standard high-clearance A-arms. They’re super durable thanks to a UV-resistant powder coating, meaning they’re immune to rust. The larger construction is eye-catching, adding an intimidation factor to your Pioneer. These A-arms ooze confidence and power. You’ll take on the wildest trails with the Atlas Pros easily and make it look good too.


No Hang-Ups with Higher Clearance 

These Atlas Pro A-Arms give you an additional 1.5” of ground clearance to keep you from getting stuck. Your wheelbase is also extended, giving you more stability. Additionally, the offset allows you to run 31” tires on your Pioneer without a lift. Obstacles you may have avoided in the past out of fear of hang-ups or losing balance will become bumps in the road with these control arms.


Correct Camber Saves Your Tires

Atlas Pro A-Arms come with fully adjustable pivot blocks. They’re set to factory standards for the fastest installation possible. If you’ve made upgrades to your machine, you can save your tires from unnecessary wear and tear by adjusting your camber. No matter what adjustments you’ve made to your side-by-side, these arms are a perfect addition.


Let SuperATV Do the Work—Preassembly Available!

Want to spend more time on the trails and less time in the garage? Purchase a set of SuperATV ball joints with your A-arms and we’ll install them for you for free! We save you money and time so you can get back to doing what you love.


NOTE: You must re-use your stock ball joints if you don’t select a pre-installed ball joint at checkout.


Keller Ball Joints

Keller Ball Joints use a two-piece design that eliminates the need for a snap ring. They thread onto your A-arms like a nut and bolt, which makes these ball joints virtually impossible to pull out. The high-quality chromoly steel stud combined with an advanced tool-steel body makes them perfect for bigger machines, bigger tires, and bigger rides. And since they’re greaseable and rebuildable, you can keep them running perfectly.


Heavy-Duty Ball Joints

Our heavy-duty ball joints are designed with ultimate performance and convenience in mind. Whether you’re doing flips or chasing hills, our proprietary blend of hardened 4340 VAR steel and zinc plating means this ball joint can take it. Our heavy-duty ball joints also come with easily-accessible grease zerks and an adjustable design. Extensive lab and field testing shows that our heavy-duty ball joints can withstand double the pressure of an OEM ball joint!
Features:
Adds a 1.5” forward offset 
Fit up to 31” tires
Made with 1.5” diameter tubing

0.5” larger than stock
0.25” larger than our standard High-Clearance 1.5” Forward Offset A-Arms

Adjustable lower pivot blocks for full camber adjustability 
Includes high-quality bushings at no extra cost
UV-resistant powder coat finish
Easy to install
Backed by a lifetime warranty
Fitment:
Honda Pioneer 1000 : 2016+
Honda Pioneer 1000-5 : 2016+
Honda Pioneer 1000 Deluxe : 2016+
Honda Pioneer 1000-5 Deluxe : 2016+
Honda Pioneer 1000 Limited Edition : 2017+
Honda Pioneer 1000-5 Limited Edition : 2017+
Honda Pioneer 1000-6 : 2023+

NOTE:

Pioneer 1000 or Pioneer 1000-5 Limited Edition Models will require Rhino 2.0 axles
You may need  wheel spacers when running 12” wheels 
If you want to run offset A-arms with our 3" Lift Kit, you must have Rhino Brand Axles. Stock axles will bind.
Does NOT fit Trail models if using with a lift kit.

Name: Honda Talon 1000R Rear A-arms
Description:
Push your Talon to its Limits

Getting hung up on rocks and logs can put a damper on your day. Instead of getting your undercarriage caught or taking the long way around—ride over them with SuperATV’s Honda Talon 1000R Rear A-Arms. They’re bigger and stronger than your OEM arms and feature industry-leading adjustable pivot block for full camber adjustability.


Bigger Than Stock with a Lifetime Warranty

We use 1.25” tubing for these control arms, which makes them 25% larger than stock! The powder coat finish adds strength and protects against rust and premature wear, and they come with free bushings. Even though we focused on making these A-arms super strong, we didn’t forget to make them look good too. They’re head turners—their sleek, tubed design will make your machine stand out in a crowd.


And because we believe in our A-arms so much we back them with a lifetime warranty.


Industry-Leading Adjustable Pivot Blocks

These A-arms come with adjustable pivot blocks, allowing you to modify your camber as needed. This means you won’t have to worry about premature tire wear if you add a lift kit, shocks, or extra weight. The innovative design and full camber adjustability give you an all-around smoother ride, no matter what. We ship them to you preadjusted to stock specs and with free bushings and heims installed so you can get riding.
Features:
1.25” tubing is 25% larger than stock
Adjustable pivot block for full camber adjustability
Includes high-quality bushings at no extra cost
UV-resistant powder coat finish
Easy to install
Backed by a lifetime warranty
Fitment: Honda Talon 1000R : 2019+

Getting hung up on rocks and logs can put a damper on your day. Instead of getting your undercarriage caught or taking the long way around—ride over them with SuperATV’s Honda Talon 1000R Rear A-Arms. They’re bigger and stronger than your OEM arms and feature industry-leading adjustable pivot block for full camber adjustability.


Bigger Than Stock with a Lifetime Warranty

We use 1.25” tubing for these control arms, which makes them 25% larger than stock! The powder coat finish adds strength and protects against rust and premature wear, and they come with free bushings. Even though we focused on making these A-arms super strong, we didn’t forget to make them look good too. They’re head turners—their sleek, tubed design will make your machine stand out in a crowd.


And because we believe in our A-arms so much we back them with a lifetime warranty.


Industry-Leading Adjustable Pivot Blocks

These A-arms come with adjustable pivot blocks, allowing you to modify your camber as needed. This means you won’t have to worry about premature tire wear if you add a lift kit, shocks, or extra weight. The innovative design and full camber adjustability give you an all-around smoother ride, no matter what. We ship them to you preadjusted to stock specs and with free bushings and heims installed so you can get riding.
Features:
1.25” tubing is 25% larger than stock
Adjustable pivot block for full camber adjustability
Includes high-quality bushings at no extra cost
UV-resistant powder coat finish
Easy to install
Backed by a lifetime warranty
Fitment: Honda Talon 1000R : 2019+

Name: Honda Pioneer 1000 Atlas Pro 1.5" Forward Offset A-Arms
Description:
Dominate with Atlas Pro A-Arms

There it is—the rough, rocky slope none of your buddies can conquer. Before they know what hit them, they’re eating your dust on your way to the top because you're equipped with SuperATV’s Honda Pioneer 1000 Atlas Pro 1.5" Forward Offset A-Arms. These rugged A-arms provide extra ground clearance, stability, and room for new 31” tires on your Pioneer to help you over boulders that hold stock machines back. With these bad boys, you’ll never back down from a hill again.


Bigger and Stronger Than Stock

Atlas Pro A-arms are an upgrade in every way. They’re 0.5” larger than stock and 0.25” larger than our standard high-clearance A-arms. They’re super durable thanks to a UV-resistant powder coating, meaning they’re immune to rust. The larger construction is eye-catching, adding an intimidation factor to your Pioneer. These A-arms ooze confidence and power. You’ll take on the wildest trails with the Atlas Pros easily and make it look good too.


No Hang-Ups with Higher Clearance 

These Atlas Pro A-Arms give you an additional 1.5” of ground clearance to keep you from getting stuck. Your wheelbase is also extended, giving you more stability. Additionally, the offset allows you to run 31” tires on your Pioneer without a lift. Obstacles you may have avoided in the past out of fear of hang-ups or losing balance will become bumps in the road with these control arms.


Correct Camber Saves Your Tires

Atlas Pro A-Arms come with fully adjustable pivot blocks. They’re set to factory standards for the fastest installation possible. If you’ve made upgrades to your machine, you can save your tires from unnecessary wear and tear by adjusting your camber. No matter what adjustments you’ve made to your side-by-side, these arms are a perfect addition.


Let SuperATV Do the Work—Preassembly Available!

Want to spend more time on the trails and less time in the garage? Purchase a set of SuperATV ball joints with your A-arms and we’ll install them for you for free! We save you money and time so you can get back to doing what you love.


NOTE: You must re-use your stock ball joints if you don’t select a pre-installed ball joint at checkout.


Keller Ball Joints

Keller Ball Joints use a two-piece design that eliminates the need for a snap ring. They thread onto your A-arms like a nut and bolt, which makes these ball joints virtually impossible to pull out. The high-quality chromoly steel stud combined with an advanced tool-steel body makes them perfect for bigger machines, bigger tires, and bigger rides. And since they’re greaseable and rebuildable, you can keep them running perfectly.


Heavy-Duty Ball Joints

Our heavy-duty ball joints are designed with ultimate performance and convenience in mind. Whether you’re doing flips or chasing hills, our proprietary blend of hardened 4340 VAR steel and zinc plating means this ball joint can take it. Our heavy-duty ball joints also come with easily-accessible grease zerks and an adjustable design. Extensive lab and field testing shows that our heavy-duty ball joints can withstand double the pressure of an OEM ball joint!
Features:
Adds a 1.5” forward offset 
Fit up to 31” tires
Made with 1.5” diameter tubing

0.5” larger than stock
0.25” larger than our standard High-Clearance 1.5” Forward Offset A-Arms

Adjustable lower pivot blocks for full camber adjustability 
Includes high-quality bushings at no extra cost
UV-resistant powder coat finish
Easy to install
Backed by a lifetime warranty
Fitment:
Honda Pioneer 1000 : 2016+
Honda Pioneer 1000-5 : 2016+
Honda Pioneer 1000 Deluxe : 2016+
Honda Pioneer 1000-5 Deluxe : 2016+
Honda Pioneer 1000 Limited Edition : 2017+
Honda Pioneer 1000-5 Limited Edition : 2017+
Honda Pioneer 1000-6 : 2023+

NOTE:

Pioneer 1000 or Pioneer 1000-5 Limited Edition Models will require Rhino 2.0 axles
You may need  wheel spacers when running 12” wheels 
If you want to run offset A-arms with our 3" Lift Kit, you must have Rhino Brand Axles. Stock axles will bind.
Does NOT fit Trail models if using with a lift kit.

Name: Can-Am Defender HD5 High-Clearance 2" Rear Offset A-Arms
Description:
More Clearance and More Performance

Going for a ride in your Defender HD5 is the highlight of your weekend. Load up the family and hit the trail… just don’t be surprised when the trail hits back. That’s why you need to upgrade your suspension with SuperATV’s High Clearance 2” Rear Offset A-Arms. They give you room for up to 32” tires when paired with front offset A-arms, a 2” offset for a longer wheelbase, and 1.25” diameter tubing. You can cruise over obstacles on the trail for a smoother, more stable ride.

1.25” x .138” DOM wall steel tubing for extreme strength
Run up to 32” rear tires
Adds 2” of rear offset


Superb Clearance and Offset

We use a unique dual-bend design on the lower pair of A-arms to raise their profile by 1.5 inches. They also come with a 2” rear offset which lengthens your wheelbase, gives you increased stability, and increases your tire clearance. You can run up to 32” tires when paired with our front offset A-arms. Bigger tires give you even more ground clearance all without a lift!


Strength You Can See

Our tubes are 1.25” in diameter and utilize a UV-resistant powder coating to maximize longevity. They’re strong, look awesome, and obviously built for battle.


Full Camber Adjustability

The pivot blocks are fully adjustable which lets you dial in your camber perfectly. We send our A-arms set to factory specs, but if you add weight to your cab or get a lift, you can adjust it to get a better ride and less wear on your components.
Features:
Adds 2” of rear offset
Adds 1.5” of ground clearance
Fit up to 32” tires with 2" forward offset front a-arms
1.25” x .138” DOM wall steel tubing
Adjustable pivot blocks for full camber adjustability
Utilizes stock A-arm bushings
UV-resistant powder coat finish
Easy to install
Backed by a lifetime warranty
Fitment:
Can-Am Defender HD 5 : 2017-2021
Can-Am Defender HD 5 DPS : 2017-2019

Name: CFMOTO UForce 1000 High Clearance 1.5" Forward Offset A-Arms
Description:
More Stability and Better Rides

Your UForce is rugged and built for the off-road. If you want it to truly handle everything you encounter, you need to upgrade to SuperATV’s High-Clearance 1.5” Forward Offset A-Arms for the CFMOTO UForce 1000. They’re stronger, come with full camber adjustment, and increase your wheelbase by 1.5 inches for more stability and room for up to 30” tires. It’s a win-win.


Bigger Tires and Better Clearance

The 1.5” forward offset gives you better tire clearance and room for up to 30” tires—all without a lift! A longer wheelbase also makes you more stable over hills and large obstacles. They make use of our unique dual-bend design to raise the profile of these arms so they won’t get hung up on rocks and other trail obstacles.


Superb Strength

Our beefed up 1.25” diameter tubing is 25% larger than stock and results in much stronger control arms. Ride hard and get wild. We want you to test the limits and ride with confidence. With the strongest suspension you can get, nothing will stop you.


Plus, they’re backed by a lifetime warranty.


Industry-Leading Adjustability

These UForce 1000 A-arms feature our industry-leading adjustable lower heim-style ball joints for full camber customization. This allows you to tailor your ride to fit your individual needs. Add a lift, new shocks, or larger tires without worrying about premature wear! Our adjustable ball joints are designed to let you maintain the ride quality you want.


Learn more about what camber is, how it affects your ride, and how to adjust it perfectly.


The Lower Uniball and Stud

We know that ball joints can be a weak link in some control arms. To ensure a bulletproof design, these A-arms are paired with a 4130 chromoly uniball in the lower arms. Match top-of-the-line materials with a stud that is 140% larger than OEM and you’ve got a set of arms that are built for battle. It is important to note that SuperATV uniball studs are not necked down. They measure 17.9 mm at the narrowest point, compared to the OEM ball joint stud at 12.7 mm. With a larger stud and meticulously heat-treated materials, you have a uniball that is much stronger than your stock ball joint.
Features:
Adds 1.5” of forward offset
Fit up to 30” tires
1.25” tubing
Heim-style uniball and stud offers full camber adjustability
Lower arms include 4130 chromoly uniball and studs
Utilizes stock A-arm bushings
UV-resistant powder coat finish
Easy to install
Backed by a lifetime warranty
Fitment: CFMOTO UForce 1000 : 2019-2021

Name: Polaris Ranger SP 570 High-Clearance Forward Offset Lower A-Arms
Description:
Better A-Arms and Bigger Tires

No matter how you ride, your stock suspension makes everything a little bit bumpier and harder. Upgrade to SuperATV’s High-Clearance Forward Offset Lower A-Arms to get beefier suspension and room for up to 28” tires. With larger tubing and high-clearance bends, they give you the strength and confidence to ride through the ditches and washouts that stopped you before.


Offset A-Arms Give You Clearance for 28” Tires

These control arms are all about clearance. They have a 1.5” forward offset for more stability and room for up to 28” tires without a lift. The high-clearance bend design gives you 1.5” of extra ground clearance, so you can clear logs, rocks, and other trail crud without getting hung up.


Way Tougher than Stock

We make these arms with 1.25” diameter tubing to make sure they’re tough enough to handle everything on the trail—they won’t buckle from big impacts. Plus, they sport a damn good-looking powder coating for corrosion resistance. 


They’re backed by a lifetime warranty because all that durability means you can’t break them. Go ahead and test us on that.
Features:
Adds a 1.5” forward offset
Adds 1.5” of ground clearance
Fit up to 28” tires 
1.25” tubing is larger than stock
Utilizes stock A-arm bushings
UV-resistant powder coat finish
Easy to install
Backed by a lifetime warranty
Fitment:
Polaris Ranger SP 570 : 2022+
Polaris Ranger SP 570 Premium : 2022+

Polaris Ranger Crew SP 570 : 2022+
Polaris Ranger Crew SP 570 Premium : 2022+

Name: Honda Pioneer 520 High-Clearance Rear Offset A-Arms
Description:
Upgrade Your Suspension

Taking your Pioneer 520 for a breezy joyride to cool down from a hard day's work is the perfect ending to a hot, busy day. But the trail has something else in mind, and your stock suspension won't cut it. Install SuperATV's Honda Pioneer 520 High-Clearance Rear Offset A-Arms to get a leg up on the trail. Our design gives you a 1.5" rear offset, extending your wheelbase. Our A-arms are made with 1.25" tubing—it's bigger than OEM and makes them superior in strength. Plus, if you add front A-arms to match the back, you can run 28" tires all the way around.


Increased Ground Clearance 

The unique bend design of these high-clearance control arms gives you an additional 1.5" of ground clearance. For more stability, we extended your wheelbase to give you a 1.5" rear offset after increasing your ground clearance. By combining these two things, you can do more with your Pioneer 520.


Strength You Can Count On

These control arms are made with 1.25" tubing. They're bigger and stronger than your stock A-arms, and we powder coated them for increased durability against corrosion and rust. Not only can these A-arms take abuse from the trail, but they also put up a good fight against the elements.


We're extremely confident in the material and design of these A-arms, so we back them with a lifetime warranty.


Adjustable Pivot Blocks That Work For You

Your A-arms also come with industry-leading adjustable pivot blocks. We make sure they're preadjusted to stock specifications right out of the box. And if you need to adjust your camber to eliminate premature wear and tear on your tires, you can do that too.
Features:
Adds 1.5” of rear offset

Name: Can-Am Commander High Clearance Lower A-Arms
Description:
Ride Longer with SuperATV

Your Can-Am Commander is built for adventure, which is great until that adventure is sidelined due to your stock A-arms getting hung up on an obstacle you thought you could take. With SuperATV’s High Clearance Lower A-Arms, problems like this will be a thing of the past. They’re bigger and stronger than stock, and deliver 1.5” of ground clearance and the ability to adjust your camber as needed.


Cover Rough Terrain with Ease

The unique bend design of these lower A-arms gives you 1.5” of additional ground clearance, which is a game changer compared to your stock suspension. That extra clearance lets you cross over logs, rocks, and other obstacles with ease. Ride as hard and as long as you want to—SuperATV’s high clearance lower A-arms will ensure that you can handle whatever the trail throws your way.


Better Materials and Stronger Design

It’s not just one thing that makes these control arms better than anything else on the market. It’s a combination of factors, from the size of the material used to the design behind it. These lower A-arms are made of 1.25” tubing, which is 25% larger than stock. We also powder coat them for UV resistance and long-lasting good looks.


To show how confident we are in the expert design, manufacturing, and testing behind our A-arms, we sell them all with a lifetime warranty. Knowing that SuperATV has got you covered no matter what truly lets you get the most out of this product.


Industry-Leading Adjustable Pivot Blocks

We make these A-arms with industry-leading adjustable pivot blocks for your convenience and peace of mind. They come preadjusted to stock specifications right out of the box, so you don’t have to mess with them if you don’t want to. But if you end up adding a lift kit or bigger tires, having total control over your camber helps to eliminate premature tire wear and improve the feel of your ride.


Learn more about what camber is, how it affects your ride, and how to adjust it perfectly.
Features:
Unique bend design adds 1.5” of ground clearance
Fit up to 28” tires
1.25” tubing is 25% larger than stock 
Adjustable pivot blocks for full camber adjustability
Utilizes stock A-arm bushings
UV-resistant powder coat finish
Easy to install
Backed by a lifetime warranty
Fitment:
Can-Am Commander 800 : 2011-2020
Can-Am Commander 1000 : 2011-2020
Can-Am Commander 800 MAX : 2016-2020
Can-Am Commander 1000 MAX : 2014-2020
